text:
He has been making sushi for decades. 

For him, making sushi is nearly effortless. 

This is not just about practice and experience. 

Watching him work shows someone entirely in the moment. 

Essentialists live their whole lives in this manner. 

Because they do, they apply their full energy to their tasks. 

They do not diffuse their efforts with distractions. 

They know execution is easy if you work hard at it. 

It is hard if you work easy at it.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Essentialists focus entirely on the present, allowing them to apply their full energy to the task at hand without distractions.
